title: Parcel Delivery Platform
name: Complete Parcel Delivery Management System
description: A complete parcel delivery management system that connects customers, delivery personnel, and admins on a unified platform. Users can book deliveries, track shipments in real-time, and manage their parcels efficiently. Features user authentication with role-based access (Customer, Delivery Personnel, Admin), real-time parcel tracking and status updates, payment integration with Stripe for secure transactions, admin dashboard for delivery management and analytics, and responsive design for mobile and desktop.

title: Local Guide Tour Management
name: Full Stack Tour Management Platform
description: A comprehensive tour management platform built with Next.js and Prisma, featuring real-time booking, guide management, and secure payment processing. Includes admin dashboard, user authentication, and responsive design for seamless user experience.

title: Medicine Vendor Platform
name: Pharmaceutical Inventory Management System
description: A comprehensive platform for managing pharmaceutical inventories, showcasing advertised products, and generating detailed sales reports. Features dynamic querying, real-time stock updates, and advanced analytics dashboard.

title: Next Step Guide
name: Sports Equipment Management Platform
description: A dynamic platform designed to make managing sports equipment effortless. With robust features like querying, recommendations, secure authentication, and responsive design for enhanced user interaction.

title: Sports Equipment Inventory
name: Inventory Management System
description: A user-friendly platform designed to streamline inventory management for sports equipment. Features powerful sorting, dynamic tables, and secure user management for efficient organization.

title: Career Counseling Platform
name: Professional Career Guidance System
description: A platform designed to guide users toward achieving their professional goals. Features personalized career advice, expert services, and user-friendly tools for career navigation.

title: Gadget Heaven
name: E-Commerce Electronics Store
description: A modern e-commerce platform for electronics and gadgets. Features product catalog, shopping cart, wishlist functionality, and responsive design for optimal user experience.

title: BPL Team Manager
name: Cricket Team Management System
description: A web application for cricket enthusiasts to build and manage their dream team for the Bangladesh Premier League. Features player browsing, detailed stats, and team customization.
